title: Large-Scale Integrated Theory and Practice Project through Creative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic social science theories and introductory-level expertise in relevant professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Blended learning course (online/offline) using digital devices (e.g., tablets, laptops). Focuses on solving real-world problems professionals may encounter in workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain concrete strategies for connecting theory and practice using creative learning design patterns.
Learners can analyze real-world problems in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) using a PBL approach and propose solutions.
Learners can design and execute collaborative projects using digital tools, expressing creative processes as visualized deliverables.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
